title: WTB: Joe Lake New York throwing with vibrant colors.

posts.post_title: WTB: Joe Lake New York throwing with vibrant colors.
posts.post_content: This card has beautiful color i have always liked it. Would like to add a cheap one that is raw or graded. It has to have strong colors, not bad corners and little or no creases. Thanks!

I had just posted this in the BST, not sure if it fits the quality/grade you're looking for etc. Asking $100

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/piojohn3/collectionpublic/2011highlights/huge/pie%2016.jpg[/IMG]
